item.title: GSoC 2022: Final Report | PEcAn Project
item.description: Project Summary Organization: PEcAn Project Mentors: Rob Kooper(@robkooper), Istem Fer(@istfer) Student: Nihar Sanda(https://koolgax99.github.io)(@koolgax99) My Proposal The project aims at improving and extending the current PEcAn REST API’s by making it more robust and dynamic from the user’s perspective. The security of the API’s will also be improved by introducing API KEY management system, rate limitng and input validation. Pre-GSoC Period This period was mainly focused on understanding the codebase of the PEcAn Project and the current state of the API’s.
